text: Every unnecessary detail, all superfluous local colouring must be eliminated. He does not want the accuracy of a police photograph, but rather he wants to show the eternal in every instant. The chilling horror of 'Malachias' is due as much to Wicki the photographer as to Wicki the director. His earlier film, 'Die Brücke,' was equally terrifying, but here the director moves out of the world of reality into an icy supernatural vacuum where the sun never shines.
